trans-unit.source: How to Use Twilio for Voice and SMS (Ruby) - Azure
trans-unit.target: How to Use Twilio for Voice and SMS (Ruby) - Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure. Code samples written in Ruby.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure. Code samples written in Ruby.

trans-unit.source: 如何使用语音和短信功能在 Ruby 中的应答
trans-unit.target: 如何使用语音和短信功能在 Ruby 中的应答

trans-unit.source: 本指南说明如何执行常见的编程任务，与应答 API 服务在 Azure 上。所包含的方案包括打电话和发送短消息服务 (SMS) 消息。应答和在应用程序中使用语音和短信的详细信息，请参阅 <link><linkText>接下来的步骤</linkText><title></title></link> 第一节。
trans-unit.target: 本指南说明如何执行常见的编程任务，与应答 API 服务在 Azure 上。所包含的方案包括打电话和发送短消息服务 (SMS) 消息。应答和在应用程序中使用语音和短信的详细信息，请参阅 <link><linkText>接下来的步骤</linkText><title></title></link> 第一节。

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>应答是什么?
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>应答是什么?

trans-unit.source: 应答是电话服务 web 服务 API，它允许您使用现有的 web 语言和技能打造语音和短信应用。应答是一个第三方服务 (不蔚蓝的功能并不是微软的产品)。
trans-unit.target: 应答是电话服务 web 服务 API，它允许您使用现有的 web 语言和技能打造语音和短信应用。应答是一个第三方服务 (不蔚蓝的功能并不是微软的产品)。

trans-unit.source: 应答的声音 允许您的应用程序来拨打和接收电话。 短信应答 允许您的应用程序来拨打和接收短信。 应答客户端 允许您的应用程序能够使用现有的互联网连接，包括移动连接的语音通信。
trans-unit.target: 应答的声音 允许您的应用程序来拨打和接收电话。 短信应答 允许您的应用程序来拨打和接收短信。 应答客户端 允许您的应用程序能够使用现有的互联网连接，包括移动连接的语音通信。

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>应答定价和特别优惠
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>应答定价和特别优惠

trans-unit.source: 可在应答定价有关的信息 <link><linkText>应答定价[twilio_pricing]</linkText><title></title></link>.蔚蓝的客户收到 <link><linkText>特价优惠[special_offer]</linkText><title></title></link>: 1000年文本免费信用或 1000 入站分钟。要报名参加此优惠或获取更多的信息，请访问 <link><linkText>http://ahoy.twilio.com/azure[special_offer]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: 可在应答定价有关的信息 <link><linkText>应答定价[twilio_pricing]</linkText><title></title></link>.蔚蓝的客户收到 <link><linkText>特价优惠[special_offer]</linkText><title></title></link>: 1000年文本免费信用或 1000 入站分钟。要报名参加此优惠或获取更多的信息，请访问 <link><linkText>http://ahoy.twilio.com/azure[special_offer]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>概念
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>概念

trans-unit.source: The Twilio API is a RESTful API that provides voice and SMS functionality for applications.
trans-unit.target: The Twilio API is a RESTful API that provides voice and SMS functionality for applications.

trans-unit.source: Client libraries are available in multiple languages; for a list, see <link><linkText>Twilio API Libraries[twilio_libraries]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Client libraries are available in multiple languages; for a list, see <link><linkText>Twilio API Libraries[twilio_libraries]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>TwiML
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>TwiML

trans-unit.source: TwiML is a set of XML-based instructions that inform Twilio of how to process a call or SMS.
trans-unit.target: TwiML is a set of XML-based instructions that inform Twilio of how to process a call or SMS.

trans-unit.source: As an example, the following TwiML would convert the text 世界您好 to speech.
trans-unit.target: As an example, the following TwiML would convert the text 世界您好 to speech.

trans-unit.source: All TwiML documents have as their root element. From there, you use Twilio Verbs to define the behavior of your application.
trans-unit.target: All TwiML documents have as their root element. From there, you use Twilio Verbs to define the behavior of your application.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>TwiML Verbs
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>TwiML Verbs

trans-unit.source: Twilio Verbs are XML tags that tell Twilio what to do.
trans-unit.target: Twilio Verbs are XML tags that tell Twilio what to do.

trans-unit.source: For example, the verb instructs Twilio to audibly deliver a message on a call.
trans-unit.target: For example, the verb instructs Twilio to audibly deliver a message on a call.

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of Twilio verbs.
trans-unit.target: The following is a list of Twilio verbs.

trans-unit.source: : Connects the caller to another phone.
trans-unit.target: : Connects the caller to another phone.

trans-unit.source: : Collects numeric digits entered on the telephone keypad.
trans-unit.target: : Collects numeric digits entered on the telephone keypad.

trans-unit.source: : Ends a call.
trans-unit.target: : Ends a call.

trans-unit.source: : Plays an audio file.
trans-unit.target: : Plays an audio file.

trans-unit.source: : Waits silently for a specified number of seconds.
trans-unit.target: : Waits silently for a specified number of seconds.

trans-unit.source: : Records the caller's voice and returns a URL of a file that contains the recording.
trans-unit.target: : Records the caller's voice and returns a URL of a file that contains the recording.

trans-unit.source: : Transfers control of a call or SMS to the TwiML at a different URL.
trans-unit.target: : Transfers control of a call or SMS to the TwiML at a different URL.

trans-unit.source: : Rejects an incoming call to your Twilio number without billing you
trans-unit.target: : Rejects an incoming call to your Twilio number without billing you

trans-unit.source: : Converts text to speech that is made on a call.
trans-unit.target: : Converts text to speech that is made on a call.

trans-unit.source: : Sends an SMS message.
trans-unit.target: : Sends an SMS message.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Twilio verbs, their attributes, and TwiML, see <link><linkText>TwiML[twiml]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about Twilio verbs, their attributes, and TwiML, see <link><linkText>TwiML[twiml]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For additional information about the Twilio API, see <link><linkText>Twilio API[twilio_api]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional information about the Twilio API, see <link><linkText>Twilio API[twilio_api]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Create a Twilio Account
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Create a Twilio Account

trans-unit.source: When you're ready to get a Twilio account, sign up at <link><linkText>Try Twilio[try_twilio]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: When you're ready to get a Twilio account, sign up at <link><linkText>Try Twilio[try_twilio]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: You can start with a free account, and upgrade your account later.
trans-unit.target: You can start with a free account, and upgrade your account later.

trans-unit.source: When you sign up for a Twilio account, you'll get a free phone number for your application.
trans-unit.target: When you sign up for a Twilio account, you'll get a free phone number for your application.

trans-unit.source: You'll also receive an account SID and an auth token.
trans-unit.target: You'll also receive an account SID and an auth token.

trans-unit.source: Both will be needed to make Twilio API calls.
trans-unit.target: Both will be needed to make Twilio API calls.

trans-unit.source: To prevent unauthorized access to your account, keep your authentication token secure.
trans-unit.target: To prevent unauthorized access to your account, keep your authentication token secure.

trans-unit.source: Your account SID and auth token are viewable at the Twilio account page[twilio_account], in the fields labeled ACCOUNT SID 和 AUTH TOKEN, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Your account SID and auth token are viewable at the Twilio account page[twilio_account], in the fields labeled ACCOUNT SID 和 AUTH TOKEN, respectively.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Verify Phone Numbers
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Verify Phone Numbers

trans-unit.source: In addition to the number you are given by Twilio, you can also verify numbers that you control (i.e. your cell phone or home phone number) for use in your applications.
trans-unit.target: In addition to the number you are given by Twilio, you can also verify numbers that you control (i.e. your cell phone or home phone number) for use in your applications.

trans-unit.source: For information on how to verify a phone number, see <link><linkText>Manage Numbers[verify_phone]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For information on how to verify a phone number, see <link><linkText>Manage Numbers[verify_phone]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Create a Ruby Application
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Create a Ruby Application

trans-unit.source: A Ruby application that uses the Twilio service and is running in Azure is no different than any other Ruby application that uses the Twilio service.
trans-unit.target: A Ruby application that uses the Twilio service and is running in Azure is no different than any other Ruby application that uses the Twilio service.

trans-unit.source: While Twilio services are RESTful and can be called from Ruby in several ways, this article will focus on how to use Twilio services with <link><linkText>Twilio helper library for Ruby[twilio_ruby]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: While Twilio services are RESTful and can be called from Ruby in several ways, this article will focus on how to use Twilio services with <link><linkText>Twilio helper library for Ruby[twilio_ruby]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: First, <link><linkText>set-up a new Azure Linux VM[azure_vm_setup]</linkText><title></title></link> to act as a host for your new Ruby web application.
trans-unit.target: First, <link><linkText>set-up a new Azure Linux VM[azure_vm_setup]</linkText><title></title></link> to act as a host for your new Ruby web application.

trans-unit.source: Ignore the steps involving the creation of a Rails app, just set-up the VM.
trans-unit.target: Ignore the steps involving the creation of a Rails app, just set-up the VM.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you create an Endpoint with an external port of 80 and an internal port of 5000.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you create an Endpoint with an external port of 80 and an internal port of 5000.

trans-unit.source: In the examples below, we will be using <link><linkText>Sinatra[sinatra]</linkText><title></title></link>, a very simple web framework for Ruby.
trans-unit.target: In the examples below, we will be using <link><linkText>Sinatra[sinatra]</linkText><title></title></link>, a very simple web framework for Ruby.

trans-unit.source: But you can certainly use the Twilio helper library for Ruby with any other web framework, including Ruby on Rails.
trans-unit.target: But you can certainly use the Twilio helper library for Ruby with any other web framework, including Ruby on Rails.

trans-unit.source: SSH into your new VM and create a directory for your new app.
trans-unit.target: SSH into your new VM and create a directory for your new app.

trans-unit.source: Inside that directory, create a file called Gemfile and copy the following code into it:
trans-unit.target: Inside that directory, create a file called Gemfile and copy the following code into it:

trans-unit.source: On the command line run bundle install.
trans-unit.target: On the command line run bundle install.

trans-unit.source: This will install the dependencies above.
trans-unit.target: This will install the dependencies above.

trans-unit.source: Next create a file called web.rb.
trans-unit.target: Next create a file called web.rb.

trans-unit.source: This will be where the code for your web app lives.
trans-unit.target: This will be where the code for your web app lives.

trans-unit.source: Paste the following code into it:
trans-unit.target: Paste the following code into it:

trans-unit.source: At this point you should be able the run the command ruby web.rb -p 5000.
trans-unit.target: At this point you should be able the run the command ruby web.rb -p 5000.

trans-unit.source: This will spin-up a small web server on port 5000.
trans-unit.target: This will spin-up a small web server on port 5000.

trans-unit.source: You should be able to browse to this app in your browser by visiting the URL you set-up for your Azure VM.
trans-unit.target: You should be able to browse to this app in your browser by visiting the URL you set-up for your Azure VM.

trans-unit.source: Once you can reach your web app in the browser, you're ready to start building a Twilio app.
trans-unit.target: Once you can reach your web app in the browser, you're ready to start building a Twilio app.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Configure Your Application to Use Twilio
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Configure Your Application to Use Twilio

trans-unit.source: You can configure your web app to use the Twilio library by updating your Gemfile to include this line:
trans-unit.target: You can configure your web app to use the Twilio library by updating your Gemfile to include this line:

trans-unit.source: On the command line, run bundle install.
trans-unit.target: On the command line, run bundle install.

trans-unit.source: Now open web.rb and including this line at the top:
trans-unit.target: Now open web.rb and including this line at the top:

trans-unit.source: You're now all set to use the Twilio helper library for Ruby in your web app.
trans-unit.target: You're now all set to use the Twilio helper library for Ruby in your web app.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>How to: Make an outgoing call
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>How to: Make an outgoing call

trans-unit.source: The following shows how to make an outgoing call.
trans-unit.target: The following shows how to make an outgoing call.

trans-unit.source: Key concepts include using the Twilio helper library for Ruby to make REST API calls and rendering TwiML.
trans-unit.target: Key concepts include using the Twilio helper library for Ruby to make REST API calls and rendering TwiML.

trans-unit.source: Substitute your values for the From 和 To phone numbers, and ensure that you verify the From phone number for your Twilio account prior to running the code.
trans-unit.target: Substitute your values for the From 和 To phone numbers, and ensure that you verify the From phone number for your Twilio account prior to running the code.

trans-unit.source: Add this function to web.md:
trans-unit.target: Add this function to web.md:

trans-unit.source: If you open-up http://yourdomain.cloudapp.net/make_call in a browser, that will trigger the call to the Twilio API to make the phone call.
trans-unit.target: If you open-up http://yourdomain.cloudapp.net/make_call in a browser, that will trigger the call to the Twilio API to make the phone call.

trans-unit.source: The first two parameters in client.account.calls.create are fairly self-explanatory: the number the call is from and the number the call is to.
trans-unit.target: The first two parameters in client.account.calls.create are fairly self-explanatory: the number the call is from and the number the call is to.

trans-unit.source: The third parameter (url) is the URL that Twilio requests to get instructions on what to do once the call is connected. In this case we set-up a URL (http://yourdomain.cloudapp.net) that returns a simple TwiML document and uses the verb to do some text-to-speech and say "Hello Monkey" to the person recieving the call.
trans-unit.target: The third parameter (url) is the URL that Twilio requests to get instructions on what to do once the call is connected. In this case we set-up a URL (http://yourdomain.cloudapp.net) that returns a simple TwiML document and uses the verb to do some text-to-speech and say "Hello Monkey" to the person recieving the call.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>How to: Recieve an SMS message
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>How to: Recieve an SMS message

trans-unit.source: In the previous example we initiated an outgoing phone call.
trans-unit.target: In the previous example we initiated an outgoing phone call.

trans-unit.source: This time, let's use the phone number that Twilio gave us during sign-up to process an incoming SMS message.
trans-unit.target: This time, let's use the phone number that Twilio gave us during sign-up to process an incoming SMS message.

trans-unit.source: First, log-in to your <link><linkText>Twilio dashboard[twilio_account]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: First, log-in to your <link><linkText>Twilio dashboard[twilio_account]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Click on "Numbers" in the top nav and then click on the Twilio number you were provided.
trans-unit.target: Click on "Numbers" in the top nav and then click on the Twilio number you were provided.

trans-unit.source: You'll see two URLs that you can configure.
trans-unit.target: You'll see two URLs that you can configure.

trans-unit.source: A Voice Request URL and an SMS Request URL.
trans-unit.target: A Voice Request URL and an SMS Request URL.

trans-unit.source: These are the URLs that Twilio calls whenever a phone call is made or an SMS is sent to your number.
trans-unit.target: These are the URLs that Twilio calls whenever a phone call is made or an SMS is sent to your number.

trans-unit.source: The URLs are also known as "web hooks".
trans-unit.target: The URLs are also known as "web hooks".

trans-unit.source: We would like to process incoming SMS messages, so let's update the URL to http://yourdomain.cloudapp.net/sms_url.
trans-unit.target: We would like to process incoming SMS messages, so let's update the URL to http://yourdomain.cloudapp.net/sms_url.

trans-unit.source: Go ahead and click Save Changes at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Go ahead and click Save Changes at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Now, back in web.rb let's program our application to handle this:
trans-unit.target: Now, back in web.rb let's program our application to handle this:

trans-unit.source: After making the change, make sure to re-start your web app.
trans-unit.target: After making the change, make sure to re-start your web app.

trans-unit.source: Now, take out your phone and send an SMS to your Twilio number.
trans-unit.target: Now, take out your phone and send an SMS to your Twilio number.

trans-unit.source: You should promptly get an SMS response that says "Hey, thanks for the ping!
trans-unit.target: You should promptly get an SMS response that says "Hey, thanks for the ping!

trans-unit.source: Twilio and Azure rock!".
trans-unit.target: Twilio and Azure rock!".

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>How to: Use Additional Twilio Services
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>How to: Use Additional Twilio Services

trans-unit.source: In addition to the examples shown here, Twilio offers web-based APIs that you can use to leverage additional Twilio functionality from your Azure application.
trans-unit.target: In addition to the examples shown here, Twilio offers web-based APIs that you can use to leverage additional Twilio functionality from your Azure application.

trans-unit.source: For full details, see the <link><linkText>Twilio API documentation[twilio_api_documentation]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For full details, see the <link><linkText>Twilio API documentation[twilio_api_documentation]</linkText><title></title></link>.
